definitions.definition: Of electromagnetic radiation beyond (higher in frequency than) light visible to the human eye ; radiation with wavelengths from 380 to 10 nanometres .
Relating to very high energies or very small distances or time spans.

main_definition: Of electromagnetic radiation beyond (higher in frequency than) light visible to the human eye ; radiation with wavelengths from 380 to 10 nanometres .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative , physics ) Relating to very high energies or very small distances or time spans.
